title: How does one actually get Hextech Annie?
body:
I know you have to craft her out of gems and such, but can you get the gems from boxes you get from a game? 
or can you only get them from boxes you buy at the store?

replies.body:
You can get them from any boxes, but they have a low drop rate.

You can also get Hextech annie as a drop.

But everyone must embrace the Annie bot Copy Pasta.

>The year is 2093. Jared lays upon his deathbed. He weakly clicks his mouse...he opens the 9032nd chest. He stares blankly at the screen. Inside is the final gem. He is finally free. He whispers 'Crud' as he drifts into the sweet embrace of death.

To unlock hextech annie you need to find 10 gemstones from hextech chests.  After that you need to right click the 10 gemstones and click forge hextech annie.  

To get gemstones you can only get them from chests.
